searchDocs.title: MaterialsContext.new​
searchDocs.content: Constructor </> MaterialsContext:MaterialsContext.new() → MaterialsContext Creates a new MaterialsContext instance.

searchDocs.title: MaterialsContext:destroy​
searchDocs.content: Destructor </> MaterialsContext:MaterialsContext:destroy() → nil Destroys an existing MaterialsContext instance and all associated metadata.

searchDocs.title: MaterialsContext:addMaterial​
searchDocs.content: Mutator </> MaterialsContext:MaterialsContext:addMaterial( MaterialInstance: Material-- The material instance to add ) → nil Creates a new Material instance and adds it to the MaterialsContext.

searchDocs.title: MaterialsContext:removeMaterial​
searchDocs.content: Mutator </> MaterialsContext:MaterialsContext:removeMaterial( identifier:: (string | Material)-- The name of the material to remove. This will not delete the material instance. ) → nil Removes an existing Material instance from the MaterialsContext instance.

searchDocs.title: Material.new​
searchDocs.content: Constructor </> Material:Material.new( name: string-- The name of the material ) → Material Creates a new Material instance.

searchDocs.title: Material:destroy​
searchDocs.content: Destructor </> Material:Material:destroy() → nil Destroys a Material instance and detaches it from the parent context.

searchDocs.title: Material:setSize​
searchDocs.content: Setter </> Material:Material:setSize( size: Vector2 -- The new size to set ) → nil Sets the shared dimensions between all texture channels.

searchDocs.title: Material:setTextureId​
searchDocs.content: Setter </> Material:Material:setTextureId( textureId: string,-- The texture ID to set channel: TextureChannel,-- The texture channel ("Albedo", "Normal", "Specular") subtextureIndex: number-- The index of the subtexture ) → nil Sets the texture map id of a subtexture in a texture channel.

searchDocs.content: Getter </> Material:Material:getSize( size: Vector2 -- The new size to set ) → Vector2  Sets the shared dimensions between all texture channels.
